short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Estimate rug rates with this extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Rugs Rate Estimation provides users with a quick and convenient way to estimate the cost of rugs based on their size. Users can input the size of the rug in square feet, and the extension will provide an estimated rate. This tool is designed to assist users in getting a preliminary idea of the cost of rugs in the USA.

Features:

Simple and intuitive user interface.
Enter the size of the rug in square feet.
Click the "Estimate Rate" button to get an estimated cost.
Provides a quick and convenient way to get an initial cost estimate for rugs.
How to Use:

Click on the extension icon in the Chrome toolbar.
The extension will display a popup with a form.
Enter the size of the rug in square feet.
Click the "Estimate Rate" button.
Receive an estimated rate for the rug based on the provided size.
Note: This extension is for informational purposes only, and actual rug prices may vary. It serves as a helpful tool for users to get a rough estimate of rug costs.
